name: makedecks
description: A deck editor for Massive Decks' deck format.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/assets/scripts && mkdir -p dist/assets/styles
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:elm && npm run build:scss && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:html && npm run build:elm:debug && npm run build:scss && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:elm: npx elm make src/elm/MakeDecks.elm --optimize --output dist/assets/scripts/make-decks.js && npx uglifyjs dist/assets/scripts/make-decks.js --compress 'pure_funcs="F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9",pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | npx uglifyjs --mangle --output=dist/assets/scripts/make-decks.js

author: Reread Games <team@rereadgames.com>
